title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Using NDB in a Cessna CJ4
description:
In this video I will show you have you can use Non Directional Beacons (NDB's) using a Cessna CJ aircraft. The default cockpit for the CJ4 has been replaced by the Working Title CJ 4 cockpit. In this video we will take off from Edinburgh Airport and fly to one of the NDB's which is close to the airport.

I will use Little NavMap to find the information in addition to the build-in flight planner of MSFS 2020. If you also want to give Little NavMap follow the steps in this video to configure it for MSFS 2020 use:

https://youtu.be/1KYuA69vgNw

If you also want to use the Working Title CJ4 cockpit visit this site:

https://github.com/Working-Title-MSFS-Mods/fspackages
